text: @realDonaldTrump That's right America, sacrifice your elders and maybe yourselves on the altar of Donald Trump's Dow Jones numbers, all because he won't sign a stimulus bill that bails out blue-collar Americans. 80% of the CARES Act went to CORPORATIONS and BILLIONAIRES! https://t.co/fLubdYajE6

domain.name: Person

domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry
